title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland (Part 9)
description: Alice attends the trial of the Knave of Hearts, who is accused of stealing tarts. The judge is the King of Hearts, the jury is filled with all sorts of creatures, and the witnesses are the Mad Hatter, the March Hare, and the Dormouse. Alice finds that she is beginning to grow again. As the Queen of Hearts continues her threats to have everyone beheaded, Alice is surprised to hear her own name called as the next witness.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
reviewWords: Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand the story
comprehension: Similes and Metaphors                : Identify and understand similes and metaphors
